lead_paragraph: David Krejci had two goals and two assists and the Boston Bruins snapped out of a scoring funk to beat the St. Louis Blues 6-5 Friday night and hang onto third place in the Atlantic Division.

headline.print_headline: Krejci Has Big Game, Bruins Hold Off Blues 6-5
headline.main: Krejci Has Big Game, Bruins Hold Off Blues 6-5

snippet: David Krejci had two goals and two assists and the Boston Bruins snapped out of a scoring funk to beat the St. Louis Blues 6-5 Friday night and hang onto third place in the Atlantic Division....
